title: Google PDF Viewer
description:
Convenience: Google PDF Viewer is built into the Chrome web browser, so you can open and view PDF files directly from the web without having to download or install any additional software.
Ease of use: Google PDF Viewer has a simple and intuitive interface that makes it easy to view PDF files. You can zoom in and out, scroll through pages, and rotate the document as needed.
Features: Google PDF Viewer offers a number of features that make it a good choice for viewing PDF files, such as:
Full-screen mode: You can view PDF files in full-screen mode for a more immersive experience.
Two-page view: You can view two PDF pages side-by-side for easier comparison.
Print preview: You can preview PDF files before printing them to make sure that they will print correctly.
Search: You can search for text within PDF files.
Annotations: You can add annotations to PDF files, such as text highlights, notes, and drawings.
Security: Google PDF Viewer is designed to be secure, so you can be confident that your PDF files are safe when you view them in the browser.
Cross-platform: Google PDF Viewer is available on all major platforms, including Windows, macOS, Chrome OS, Android, and iOS. This makes it a good choice for users who work on multiple devices.
